title: The Besties Podcast XVIII
description: This week doesn't seem like a fair fight, but at least your buddies The Besties are still getting along. This week: Hear how honestly terrified Justin is of mice, walk the exotic wasteland that is Huntington, WV and be there when a new king game is crowned!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
